--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Afterburner / Scattershot / Nosecone ---

Pacifix shakes his head at Grimlock's back, and nods to the both 
of them, "Welcome to the team, Dios and Repungus. You should 
board the ship promptly, that last message was my pilot." He turns 
to Hoist, "It will be a pleasure to have you along, Hoist. Would you 
please join the rest of the crew, we leave soon, as you have just 
heard." Pacifix waits for the others to board. He wants to talk to 
Ironhide before the leave.

Crossroads get settled in, and awaits the launch.

Afterburner races onto the ship, anxious to go, and he sits down 
quickly. He is swiftly followed by the down-to-business Scattershot 
who takes a seat beside the impatient Technobot. Nosecone 
wonders onto the ship, taking in all of the technology on board the 
stealth prototype Autobot cruiser deemed "Hidden One" by Pacifix 
due to its cloaking and stealth abilities.

>

> "Nothing left here on Cybertron but bad drinks and worse memories. I
> guess I'm in. My name is Dios."
